    • Custom Software Development

    A bespoke software can strikingly level up your game in business as it is significantly more efficient, easy to integrate, and scalable.

    Tailor-made features of custom software give you a competitive advantage of standing out

    If you have a unique business or a unique software idea for a simple business and are unwilling to pay for the features you don’t need-iBOS is all ears. A custom made software is certainly the better call to make. It’s less susceptible to breaches and offers higher security than package software. Our talented team of software engineers awaits to hear you out and provide you with the software created especially to meet your requirements. With a view to increasing the level of communication, profitability, and productivity. Also, a much higher level of security than any off-the-shelf software. Enterprise Software Development, Cloud-Based Solutions, Custom ERP, SaaS (Software as a Service) Development, Tailor-made CMS-Just name it!

    Integrable and Organized

    HOur custom software keeps the overall system organized through -

    • Integrating business processes

    • Control of company and management over all the process

    • Reasonable development and maintenance cost

    Pertinent Designing

    We believe in ensuring maximum system relevance with -

    • Interface design relevant to your business

    • Pertinent UI & UX

    • Higher responsiveness

    Security and Operation Traceability

    We care about your data privacy and deliver you -

    • Secured cloud-based data

    • Minimized scope fraudulent activities

    • Traceability of all the operations

    Technology We Used

    .Net, React, JavaScript, Laravel, ODOO, Django.

    Highlights

    A custom software liberates you from the worries about fitting your activities into a standard software framework

    1. Custom software streamlines the procedures, increases collaboration, & boosts the level of productivity.
    2. Relevant design backed by supportive UI/UX and superior responsiveness
    3. Maximum security to the data with a cloud-based system and operational traceability

    Trusted by Industry Leaders

    We are trusted by some of the most remarkable companies of Bangladesh.
